items.title: Magento Development
items.description: Creation and maintenance of high-performance, secure, and scalable Magento e-commerce sites. Deep expertise in custom module development and performance optimization.

items.title: Technical Leadership
items.description: Leading technical teams, architecture definition, implementation of best practices, and mentoring. Management of complex projects and stakeholder coordination.

items.title: B2B/B2C Solutions
items.description: Development of custom B2B and B2C e-commerce platforms. Integration of complex systems, extensive catalog management, and advanced customization.

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.description: Analysis and improvement of e-commerce site performance. Optimization of loading times, cache management, and server resources.

items.title: Integration & APIs
items.description: Creation of robust APIs and integration with third-party systems (ERP, PIM, CRM). Development of custom integration solutions for specific needs.

items.title: Security & Maintenance
items.description: Security audits, implementation of best practices, preventive and corrective maintenance. Management of updates and security patches.
